name: Sunlighter (MikRas1)
description:
Another day on the job, as an interstellar electrician. As usual, you've been called out to fix a bunch of broken suns. 

Better be quick. Don't want too many species going extinct while the sun is out...

Controls:

Press A or D to look around.

Hold down left mouse button to charge engines. While charging, the ship will turn towards the direction of the mouse. Release to boost.

Disclaimer: This game is a submission for a 24 hour gamejam, hosted at Sonic College in Denmark. Main menu and credits were added afterwards.
